content: in this legal case a court in taranto made a final ruling after a 6year process the ruling assigned exclusive ownership of an apartment to one party and ordered another party to pay a certain amount of money to the owner additionally a third party was ordered to reimburse a certain amount of money to the second party the case involved a plaintiff cama suing defendants casa and cafr to dissolve the community inheritance of their deceased mother spar the defendants objected to the application but the court found their objections unfounded the court then evaluated the properties determined their values and ordered the division of the assets and reimbursement of expenses the case is now ready for final adjudication the ruling was made on june 23 2023 and filed in the clerks office on june 27 2023
